# Support

## How to Get Support

If you encounter any issues or have questions about the project, there are several ways to get support:

1. **GitHub Issues**: The best way to get support is by creating an issue on the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/mosesman831/OCI-OcC-Fix/issues) page. Please provide as much detail as possible, including steps to reproduce the issue, screenshots, and any relevant logs.

2. **Documentation**: Make sure to check the project's [README.md](https://github.com/mosesman831/OCI-OcC-Fix/blob/main/README.md) and the wiki pages for detailed information about installation, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.

3. **Community Support**: You can also seek help from the community by participating in discussions on the project's GitHub repository.

## How to Contribute

We welcome contributions from the community! Here are some ways you can contribute:

1. **Report Bugs**: If you find a bug, please report it by creating an issue on the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/mosesman831/OCI-OcC-Fix/issues) page. Provide as much detail as possible to help us reproduce and fix the issue.

2. **Submit Pull Requests**: If you have a fix or improvement, feel free to submit a pull request. Make sure to follow the project's coding standards and include tests for your changes.

3. **Improve Documentation**: If you find any errors or omissions in the documentation, please submit a pull request with your improvements.

4. **Feature Requests**: If you have an idea for a new feature, create an issue on the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/mosesman831/OCI-OcC-Fix/issues) page and describe your idea in detail.

## Support the Project

If you find this project useful, please consider supporting its development:

- **Star the Repository**: Give the project a star on GitHub to show your appreciation.
- **Buy Me a Coffee**: You can support the project by buying me a coffee. Visit [Buy Me a Coffee](https://ko-fi.com/R6R1VPIGM) to make a donation.

Thank you for your support!
